txt.en:
My dear ally,

I hope this message finds you well, and that you found success in your adventures to the south! If that is so, I beg you to remember your good friend Durin and the other dwarves of Skarháld. Our travails are not yet concluded, and we have need of your strength and your wisdom! Return when you can to Skarháld in Ered Mithrin, the Grey Mountains, and I will meet you by the stable-master on the lowest level.

There is much yet to be done, and I would welcome your help!

Your friend Durin, son of King Thorin Stonehelm, charged with the defence of Skarháld
